synopsis.text: Asumi Kominami, a maid and medical school hopeful, and Mafuyu Kirisu, a clumsy yet stern teacher, join Nariyuki Yuiga in his final year of high school. To secure a full college scholarship, Nariyuki becomes a tutor to three gifted but challenged students: Fumino Furuhashi, a literary genius struggling with science; Rizu Ogata, a math whiz with a passion for the arts; and Uruka Takemoto, a top athlete grappling with academics. With university exams looming, Nariyuki must guide his students through their weakest subjects while navigating a complex web of growing affection. This romantic comedy follows the group as they balance the pursuit of their dreams, their studies, and the possibility of love.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
